name: General Canastra
description:
On an ordinary day like any other, the Mineiros get up and go and have their breakfast. But something happened, every cheese from Minas Gerais fled to the city of cheeses.

Walk in the shoes of General Canastra in defense of the nobles derived from milk. Build towers, manage units, evolve your defenses, survive, for the glory of the King Queijão.

Tower Defense for mobile devices focused on the management of towers and units, each tower having its evolutions tree.
